DEMO KIA RIO 1.4 LS 2022 M/T  FOR SALE AT KIA CENTURION IN PRETORIA.

**SUBJECT TO IN-HOUSE FINANCE**

5 Years / Unlimited Km Warranty & 4 Years / 60 000 Km Service Plan.
FEATURES Include:  2 Airbags, Aircon, 16" Alloy Wheels, Auto Head Lights,  Central Locking, Electric Mirrors and Windows, Multi Function Steering, Tow Bar, Radio with Bluetooth and USB Port, Android Auto Car play, Smash and Grab. 


Price excludes delivery and registration fees.
